## Claim Registry

- Claim registry updated? Yes / No

- New claim IDs introduced:

## GA-Analog Gates (Required Checks)

### Gate 1 — Terminology & Consistency

- [ ] Terminology matches governance/terminology-authority.md
- [ ] No conflicting product naming

### Gate 2 — Technical Accuracy

- [ ] Engineering reviewer assigned
- [ ] Claims align with current repo capability
- [ ] Roadmap items labeled explicitly (if any)

### Gate 3 — Claim Defensibility

- [ ] No absolute guarantees without proof
- [ ] No compliance certification claims unless verified
- [ ] Comparative claims include a basis or are removed

### Gate 4 — Channel Rules

- [ ] Internal: Draft permitted
- [ ] Partner: Review-Ready minimum
- [ ] Public: Near-Final + approved claim IDs only

### Gate 5 — Risk Review (If Applicable)

- [ ] Security language reviewed (required if security/compliance claims changed)
- [ ] Legal review flagged (required if commitments/guarantees implied)

## CI Outputs (Paste Links/Notes)

- Claim lint: PASS / WARN / FAIL
- Consistency check: PASS / WARN / FAIL
- Risk report: PASS / WARN / FAIL

## Reviewer Checklist

- [ ] Marketing Governance
- [ ] Engineering (platform/architecture)
- [ ] Security (if applicable)
- [ ] Sales (if sales enablement touched)
- [ ] Founder/Exec (if public channel)

## Notes / Open Questions

- Any known gaps or follow-up tickets?
- Any claims requiring future evidence or deprecation date?
